channel.title: git on Home
channel.description: Recent content in git on Home

item.title: Git Checkout
item.description: Git Checkout Documentation Git Checkout Git checkout is used to switch or restore branches. Switch Branch From Git Branch, you can identify the branch name to which you want to switch to. git checkout <branch>

item.title: Git Branch
item.description: Git Branch Documentation Git Branch Display Local Branches Displays local branches. The (*) asterisk symbol next to branch indicates the current branch. git branch Display Remote Branches Displays remote branches, i.e., branches hosted on the remote repositories. git branch --remote // displays only remote repo git branch -a // displays remote and local repo Checking Remote Repository Information Provides remote repository information such as repository structure, configuration and branches. git remote show origin
